text: Animals of the Bible is a book illustrated by Dorothy P. Lathrop with text compiled by Helen Dean Fish. Released by J. B. Lippincott Company, it was the first recipient of the Caldecott Medal for illustration in 1938.American Library Association: Caldecott Medal Winners, 1938 - Present. URL accessed 27 May 2009. == Plot == Animals of the Bible takes 31 Biblical stories of creatures who helped Biblical heroes complete their tasks and illustrates them. ==References== Category:1937 children's books Category:American picture books Category:Caldecott Medal-winning works Category:J. B. Lippincott & Co. books Category:Books based on the Bible
